title: SECRET ADVENTURES OF JULES VERNE 16 The Rockets Red Glare (XviD)
description:
THE SECRET ADVENTURES OF JULES VERNE
The steam-punk adventures of the young Jules Verne and his fellow travellers aboard the airship Aurora. 

16. "The Rocket&#039;s Red Glare"  (10/29/2000)

The group is summoned to British Columbia after an American General, Steele, is kidnapped by Indians from the British territory. To avoid a war between the two countries, Fogg and the others must find Steele. They discover that Steele&#039;s kidnapping was engineered by Count Gregory and the League of Darkness. The League steals the Aurora and drops Steele&#039;s corpse off at West Point to further set the two countries upon each other. With the aid of a local Indian, the team finds Gregory&#039;s waterfall hideout, from which he plans to launch a rocket and destroy West Point as President Lincoln gives a speech.

Guest star: Rick Overton (Count Gregory), Jonathan Coy (Sir Jonathan Chatsworth) , Patrick James Bird (Atonwa), Daniel Bisson (Black Robed Surgeon #1), Peter Blaikie (Abraham Lincoln), James Bradford (Governor), Philip Cole (Steward), Raphael Dumas (Mohawk Chief), Barry Flatman (General Teddy Steele), Kristen Holden-Reid (George Custer), Jason Knight (Singing Cadet), Constantine Kourtidis (Black Robed Surgeon #2), George Leach (Saswen), Al Vandecruys (Sergeant)
